data.text:
@LowbridgeG Letter to Anonymous:

https://t.co/l6gS9AaSDB

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous
@LowbridgeG @musedhair I was booked to move to the UK, but there’s no way I’d have done it providing I got that hell vax.
@stereoinferno @musedhair Most here wanted to go to the pub or on holidays, a small cohort were genuinely fearful of a virus.. Natural Selection

@musedhair @LowbridgeG Excuse me for a sec, while I become a jerk… 

Yeah but so have we because we all sat there with side eyes and when we researched, it was all there. Even if we write off half of the jabbed, who didn’t want/we’re coerced, it’s still too much ‘dumb’ in society. It’s heartbreaking.
@LowbridgeG @musedhair The date on that tweet is more scandalous than the content.
@insectoyd @Evelyn55996644 Definitely Wasn't happening for my family I'd rather die

@Evelyn55996644 @LowbridgeG So glad i didn’t get it.
Even if it cost me my job
